description: Digital First, Ad Agency, is seeking a Director-level Project Manager to join the team.  You will be spearheading all elements of the engagement including project management: project definition, scope management, risk management, hand-off management, and team management. The ideal candidate will have automotive client experience. YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES • Drive the planning and execution of a simultaneous integrated projects • Leads project direction collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and re-define project specifications (goals, budget, schedule, and scope)  • Lead and mentor Project Managers and Sr. Project Managers • Author and review program SOW’s and estimate documentation when needed • Be responsible for the development and management of timelines, quality and profit margins related to agency deliverables • Oversee internal account-related meetings including weekly producer/account status meetings, internal reviews, etc. • Direct resource management against deliverables ensuring alignment against work and required times throughout the project lifecycle • Lead financial management and budget tracking; manage and own project financials • Risk management, proactively mitigating risks and comfortable driving solutions to adapt to changes from inception or project to delivery  • Drive project measurement, reporting and analysis • Evaluate and optimize production workflows and processes • Project documentation samples are required (SOW and Project Plan) SKILLS/EXPERIENCE • 7-9 years of industry experience producing and project management at a media, entertainment or creative brand and/or interactive advertising agency • Working knowledge & understanding of web technologies, including HTML, DHTML, content management systems and deployment platforms, etc. • Direct Marketing and CRM experience a plus! • Excellent documentation and presentation development, such as financial reports, proposals, roadmaps and workflows • Strong communication and presentations skills - capable of presenting solutions in a clear, logical manner • Excellent negotiation skills Contract- 40 hours/week Duration- on-going Hybrid Schedule- 3 days in-office Location- West Los Angeles
